text: Sergei Aleksandrovich Korshunov (; 8 October 1928 – 12 December 1982) was an association footballer from the former Soviet Union who played for FC Dynamo Kyiv and Moscow teams. In 1956 Korshunov played couple of games for Ukraine at the Spartakiad of the Peoples of the USSR.Football at the 1956 Spartakiad of the Peoples of USSR ==References== Category:1928 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Soviet footballers Category:Soviet Top League players Category:FC Dynamo Moscow players Category:FC Spartak Moscow players Category:PFC CSKA Moscow players Category:FC Dynamo Kyiv players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:Soviet football managers Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya managers Category:FC Gomel managers Category:FC Karpaty Lviv managers Category:FC Desna Chernihiv managers Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz managers Category:FK Daugava Rīga managers Category:Association football forwards
title: Sergei Korshunov
